00056 /* Creation flags. */
00057 #define T_FPU     XNFPU
00058 /* <!> Low bits must conflict with XNFPU|XNSHADOW. */
00059 #define T_CPU(id) ((id) & 0xff)
00060

00081 #define xnprio2rt(xnprio) (T_LOPRIO + (xnprio) - 1)

00107 typedef struct rt_task {
00108 
00109     unsigned magic;   /* !< Magic code - must be first */
00110 
00111     xnholder_t link;
00112 
00113     xntimer_t timer;
00114 
00115 #define link2rtask(laddr) \
00116 ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->link)))
00117 
00118     xnthread_t thread_base;
00119 
00120 #define thread2rtask(taddr) \
00121 ((taddr) ? ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)(taddr)) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->thread_base))) : NULL)
00122 
00123     rt_handle_t handle; /* !< Handle in registry -- zero if unregistered. */
00124 
00125     int suspend_depth;
00126 
00127     int overrun;
00128

00145 } RT_TASK;
